page.title: 05INDUSTRY NEAR HOTON
page.content: { Muggins Pottery, Burton Bandalls} have been using the barn for the last 17 years to make functional pottery with applied faces, employing 4 people. { Mister Fox, Hoton}employ 4-6 people, have been in business for 3 years making high quality mens & ladies shirts for equestrian & sports activities. { Abel Building Contractors, Hoton} employ 5 people hiring out heavy plant machinery. Previously a wheelwright/blacksmiths. { Evening Primrose, Prestwold.}Oil Company. { Germplasm Resource Management Ltd., {Prestwold,}employ 8 people to test various crops & advise on agricultural contract work.
